directions: Crumble crackers finely in mixing bowl and add pecans. In another bowl, add 1/2 cup sugar to beaten egg whites slowly and beat until very stiff. Add remaining 1/2 cup sugar slowly.  Add vanilla.  Fold this mixture into crackers and nuts.
Spoon onto lightly greased cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until light brown.
title: Ritz® Cookies
